replies.body:
{{champion:74}} ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ raise your Dongers ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ


{{champion:33}} ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ Ok. ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ
What happened to your stories for the sales schedules? It was one of the things I looked forward to during the week{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

I still do them...but only on Thursday sale day. 


I don't do it on mondays cause of my job.
I thought item sets were coming this patch too. What happened riot?
They said they are working on it, but it's not a priority.  I don't recall seeing anything saying they were coming out this patch.  Maybe later this Summer or Fall is what I would guess.
in the legacy client retires article they stated as long as no hiccups they were coming out in 7.10

Exact quote from article
"Item Set Creator Tool. We're now aiming to bring the feature... to the PBE with patch 7.10. Barring any problems, it will then come to live servers soon after."
So it -might- launch live -during- 7.10, but is by no means assured.
that sound's to me like it might launch during the PBE patch 7.10 patch but we probably won't see on Live intil 7.11.
Item sets on the LCU was in the PBE cycle for this patch, so that's why basically everyone assumed that item sets were coming to the LCU this patch.

"Vi’s R - Assault and Battery will no longer carry her into the enemy fountain if her target Recalls during the travel time"

Well, no more Vi diving fountain videos to be made.
Thx Vandiril
proof that riot listens after all
I wanted to make a supersonic woman of her... ;-;

I'll be the one and say it (though many will groan) but a single weekend during summer for plain old URF would mean the world to me as well as my brothers who love playing that game mode. Please consider releasing it some time during the summer. Thanks :)

But they don't like URF
they like raaaandom URF
If I'm going to be completely demolished by the enemy
I want to at least choose the captain that's going down with the ship
Amen.

Thank you so much for this set of updates Riot!  The ping muting and surrendering at 15 are something I've seen requested on the Boards for a while now, and I can't thank you guys enough for having our backs on this one.
sounds like you got lots of question marks and then just give up at 10mins XDXD. a joke
When is the 5 ban system going to be put in place?
no poro updates? poros should be the #1 priority!{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
You mean #1 POROrity
I logged in just to upvote this comment. Well played.
I'm tempted to try Rammus Bot.  Probably a horrible idea but I think I'll learn the hard way.

From personal experience, its not bad as long as the adc attacks the champ that hits him because ramous has no poke nor control of the field if there's more than one champ but he is a great decoy for the enemy champs to focus their attack on while your adc attacks them without realizing it. Also rammus w does help punish the champs that attack him but don't overestimate it early game. This is from personal experience.

Lol if you want Rakan to max his W first then you ought to make his early shield cooldown a bit lower than 20 secs, it's hard to justify grabbing the W on him first when it retains such a long cooldown, doesn't get any extra cc with rank, and his shield would have to stay at a 20 second cooldown as opposed to bringing it down to 10 secs and retaining the same 1 sec knockup, with only a very slightly longer cooldown than if you maxed it. 
When you look at it objectively you're obviously better off with maxing E first and using the coin to hit rank 3 on the W by 9 so you get slightly better CD and damage on the knockup with your 50% reduction in CD on the shield dash.
While I'm still not tempted to max W first, I might max Q first now with the range increase. Honestly my least favorite thing about that ability was the range.

It doesn't increase the heal amount with rank, the heal is level scaling. I hate his Q personally because it has such a long cooldown for what it does and the fact that it's the most difficult heal to use in the game, and they couldn't even give it some splash damage or something to make it feel decent.
Item sets?
Soon™
So Graves can get his cigar back but he can't get his cigar back in the patch note icon? Or in this icon either? {{champion:104}}

Lemmie summarize the important things in this patch:
You. Can. Mute. Pings. Now.
No {{champion:498}} nerfs?
When u open patch notes and realize every champ they hit is on ur roster {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Nerf SV "a bit" by toning down the hp regen from 200% to 100%{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Where are the item sets?
Soon™
Item sets!
Soon™
Item set custom r.i.p {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Soon™

That is a terrible reason to nerf spirit visage. You just changed Banshees veil (also stupid as all staffs/scepters in this game are offensive and most accessory type items are defensive) and introduced a bunch of confusing and convoluted alternatives to magic resist. Why do you think people are using spirit visage? It's what people know works, it's go-to because even if you don't directly benefit from the passive it's actually a good MR item that isn't one of the random NEW AND DIFFERENT changes that people just aren't comfortable with. Look how strong abyssal scepter is, except nobody wants to build it because the changes are confusing and part of its strength is in the fact that it increases magic damage by 10% (which ONLY SOME CHAMPIONS CAN BENEFIT FROM.)
"Guys even though tank Fizz has faded out let's rework him to prevent tank Fizz and reintroduce tank Fizz. Meanwhile AP Fizz will be absolutely slaughtered." -Riot Games
Because reducing base damage and increasing AP ratios clearly encourages players to _not_ purchase AP over tank items...
No Lucian changes and Maokais sapplings got a buff? Sad day....

> Maokais sapplings got a buff

Arguable.  

It seems like they want Maokai to max his saplings last rather than first (as Support Maokai currently does).
ok.
Where items sets ? -_-
Soon™

Hey guys just wanted to know if there was a problem with Pulsefire Caitlyn skin on the patch 7.10 because it said in the patch notes it was going to be out in this patch but i have nothin up in my shop so im wondering if i missed something lol
look i dont mind ascension because i quite enjoy it but where the fuck has definitely not dominion been? its been like half a year since that shit was last rotated
